title: IllegalProductException: Normal scoped producer method may not return null

labels.name: triage/needs-reproducer
labels.description: We are waiting for a reproducer.

body:
### Describe the bug

When upgrading to Quarkus 2.14.0 one of our applications fails to complete requests for non existing resources, in this case /favicon.ico:
```
2022-11-11T09:11:35.723+0100  ERROR io.undertow.request.io Exception handling request e6e5f0b3-6b9e-4fe5-85d3-bceb80ba7498-1 to /favicon.ico: javax.enterprise.inject.IllegalProductException: Normal scoped producer method may not return null: io.quarkus.vertx.http.runtime.CurrentVertxRequest.getCurrent()
	at io.quarkus.vertx.http.runtime.CurrentVertxRequest_ProducerMethod_getCurrent_6dc23d16d53ba5c34e1e7b6f54290fd7b9aebd76_Bean.create(Unknown Source)

	at io.undertow.servlet.handlers.ServletInitialHandler.dispatchRequest(ServletInitialHandler.java:227)
	at io.undertow.servlet.handlers.ServletInitialHandler.handleRequest(ServletInitialHandler.java:152)

Caused by: javax.enterprise.inject.IllegalProductException: Normal scoped producer method may not return null: io.quarkus.vertx.http.runtime.CurrentVertxRequest.getCurrent()

```

### Expected behavior

Response is 404.

### Actual behavior

Response is 500.

### How to Reproduce?

Haven't managed to create a reproducer. A simple app with undertow, micrometer, and quarkus-resteasy-reactive-jackson did not reproduce it.

### Output of `uname -a` or `ver`

_No response_

### Output of `java -version`

_No response_

### GraalVM version (if different from Java)

_No response_

### Quarkus version or git rev

2.14.0

### Build tool (ie. output of `mvnw --version` or `gradlew --version`)

_No response_

### Additional information

The application has the following modules:
```
2022-11-11T09:11:24.265+0100  INFO  io.quarkus Installed features: [agroal, cdi, flyway, hibernate-validator, jdbc-mssql, mailer, micrometer, mongodb-client, narayana-jta, oidc, quartz, qute, rest-client-reactive, rest-client-reactive-jackson, resteasy-reactive, resteasy-reactive-jackson, scheduler, security, servlet, smallrye-context-propagation, smallrye-graphql-client, smallrye-health, smallrye-openapi, swagger-ui, vault, vertx]
```
